reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.explanation: With automatic reminders, communication with clients can be improved, missed appointments eliminated and clients returned.
reminders.recommendedExplanation: 97% of people open and read the SMS within the first 10 minutes of receiving it. People read emails much less!

smsReminder.title: SMS Reminder

You can be sure that customers will see the reminder on time because 97% of people open and read the SMS within the first 10 minutes of receiving it.

setupApp.title: Set up Termmy for success
setupApp.text: Complete the steps bellow so you can unlock the full potential of your business.
setupApp.clientText: Organize your clients, keep detailed notes and see their entire appointment history.
setupApp.serviceText: Set the price, duration, color or service and block extra time if needed.
setupApp.worktimeText: Set your working hours when you available to offer your services.
setupApp.smsReminderText: Ensure clients show up to appointments by sending them pre-made text reminders.
setupApp.calendarText: Termmy simplifies your life by connecting to all of your other calendars.
setupApp.bookingText: Allow clients to book themselves based on your schedule on your personalised booking website
setupApp.paymentText: Set up your card and receive money directly online to your account
setupApp.holidayText: Set up holiday, so then your client can't booking this date
